name: Vegan Chickpea Curry
ingredients: chickpeas, coconut milk, curry powder, onion, garlic, ginger, tomatoes
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic and ginger. Add spices and tomatoes. Add chickpeas and coconut milk. Simmer for 20 minutes.

name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
ingredients: quinoa, sweet potato, avocado, kale, tahini dressing
instructions: Roast sweet potato. Cook quinoa. Massage kale. Assemble bowl with all ingredients and drizzle with tahini.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: tofu, bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, soy sauce, ginger, garlic
instructions: Press and cube tofu. Stir fry vegetables and tofu with soy sauce, ginger and garlic. Serve over rice.

name: Lentil Soup
ingredients: red lentils, carrots, celery, onion, vegetable broth, cumin
instructions: Sauté vegetables. Add lentils and broth. Simmer until lentils are tender. Season with cumin.

name: Fruit Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: banana, berries, almond milk, chia seeds, granola
instructions: Blend fruits with almond milk. Top with chia seeds and granola.

name: Vegan Tacos
ingredients: black beans, corn tortillas, avocado, lettuce, salsa
instructions: Mash black beans. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with beans, avocado, lettuce and salsa.

name: Greek Salad
ingredients: cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, olive oil, lemon juice
instructions: Chop vegetables. Mix with olives. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Vegetable Curry
ingredients: potatoes, cauliflower, peas, curry paste, coconut milk
instructions: Sauté vegetables. Add curry paste and coconut milk. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

name: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: arborio rice, mushrooms, vegetable broth, white wine, nutritional yeast
instructions: Sauté mushrooms. Toast rice. Gradually add broth and wine while stirring. Finish with nutritional yeast.

name: Vegan Chocolate Cake
ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, apple sauce, vinegar
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.
